posts.post_content:
Strictly less humanoid than the [first original artwork](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=1927).  
Strictly less cartoony than the [second original artwork](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=1925).  
Strictly less hairy than the [third original artwork](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=1924).  
Strictly less nightmare-inducing than the [fourth original artwork](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=1926).   
  
And yet, strictly more cute than all of them combined.
posts.html:
Strictly less humanoid than the first original artwork.
Strictly less cartoony than the second original artwork.
Strictly less hairy than the third original artwork.
Strictly less nightmare-inducing than the fourth original artwork.

And yet, strictly more cute than all of them combined.
